text:
My team is the Fusion
Machine Learning Team.
We work on putting AI automations
into Autodesk Fusion
to help customers design
and make things,
and make a better world.

At Autodesk, we want
to be at the forefront
of putting cutting edge innovations
into all of our products.
As this technology evolves quite rapidly,
we need to be able
to create prototypes, train models

including large models
or foundation models,
and get them into the product.

We choose AWS because
it's a secure, scalable,
and most importantly, powerful solution

for getting things done
that we need to get done.

AWS Trainium provides one of
the most cost-effective ways
to get raw mathematical compute power out
of any compute solution on the market.

You need to be able to set up
your machine learning models
such they can take advantage of Trainium.
So it's not a one-to-one with GPUs,
but it is an incredible solution.
And in our experiments is
by far the most cost effective solution.
By using AWS, we are able to scale
our machine learning models
and services quickly,

as well as all of our
computationally intensive services.

Our customers have the
peace of mind to know

that their simulations
are going to get done,
they will be submitted,
and they will be completed

because we can rely on AWS
to have the compute we need,

even if we need to scale
to thousands of instances.
